hero.title: The Smart Food Journal for Modern Nutritionists
hero.subtitle: Empower your practice with NutriTrack Pro. A seamless B2B platform to monitor patient meals, provide instant feedback, and track progress like never before.

features.title: Built for Professional Practice
features.subtitle: Everything you need to manage your patients' nutritional journeys efficiently and effectively.

feature1.title: Effortless Food Logging
feature1.description: Patients can quickly log meals with photos, descriptions, and portion sizes.

feature2.title: Real-Time Professional Feedback
feature2.description: Leave comments and guidance on every meal entry, fostering a strong patient-nutritionist connection.

feature3.title: Visual Progress Tracking
feature3.description: Track weight, measurements, and hydration with intuitive charts and graphs to keep patients motivated.

forProfessionals.title: Supercharge Your Nutrition Coaching

feature1.title: Centralized Patient Dashboard
feature1.description: Manage all your patients from one place with at-a-glance insights and alerts.

feature2.title: AI-Powered Meal Suggestions
feature2.description: Leverage AI to generate creative and suitable meal ideas for your patients' plans.

feature3.title: Professional PDF Reports
feature3.description: Export branded, professional summaries of patient progress for reviews and records.

forProfessionals.testimonial: "NutriTrack Pro has transformed how I interact with my clients. The ability to see photos and comment in real-time is a game-changer for accountability and support."

footer.copyright: Â© {year} NutriTrack Pro. All rights reserved.

login.title: Login
login.description: Enter your email below to login to your account.
login.errorInvalidCredential: The email or password you entered is incorrect.
login.errorGenericDescription: Could not sign you in. Please try again.

register.title: Create an account
register.description: Enter your information to create an account.
register.name: Name
register.emailInUseDescription: This email address is already in use. Please log in.

welcome.title: Welcome to NutriTrack Pro!
welcome.description: Let's finish setting up your profile. Please enter your current stats and, if you have one, your nutritionist's invitation code.
welcome.errorMessage: The invitation code you entered is not valid. Please check and try again, or leave it blank.
welcome.genericError: Something went wrong. Please try again.

dashboard.recentMealsDesc: A log of your most recent food entries.
dashboard.weightProgressDesc: Your weight trend over the last month.

addMeal.title: Add New Meal
addMeal.description: Log a new meal to your food journal. Click save when you're done.
addMeal.editDescription: Update the details for this meal.
addMeal.uploadPrompt: Click or drag file to this area to upload
addMeal.name: Meal Name

validation.photoRequired: A photo of the meal is required.
validation.nameTooLong: The meal name cannot be longer than {max} characters.
validation.descriptionTooLong: The description cannot be longer than {max} characters.

journal.title: Meals for {date}
journal.description: You logged {count} meal on this day.
journal.description_plural: You logged {count} meals on this day.
journal.noMeals: No meals logged for this day.
journal.placeholder: Select a day on the calendar to view your logged meals.

delete.title: Are you sure?
delete.description: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete the meal entry for "{mealName}".

progress.title: My Progress Overview
progress.description: A detailed look at your journey towards your goals.
progress.weightTrackingDesc: Your weight trend over time. Keep up the great work!
progress.weeklyHydrationDesc: Your daily water intake vs. your goal.

plan.title: My Meal Plan: {planTitle}
plan.description: Assigned by {author}. Here is your guide for the week.

monday.name: Quinoa Salad
monday.details: 1 cup cooked quinoa, mixed vegetables, lemon vinaigrette.

tuesday.name: Greek Yogurt with Berries
tuesday.details: 1 cup yogurt, 1/2 cup mixed berries, 1 tbsp chia seeds.

tuesday.name: Chicken Stir-fry
tuesday.details: 150g chicken breast, broccoli, bell peppers, light soy sauce.

wednesday.name: Quinoa Salad
wednesday.details: 1 cup cooked quinoa, mixed vegetables, lemon vinaigrette.

thursday.name: Greek Yogurt with Berries
thursday.details: 1 cup yogurt, 1/2 cup mixed berries, 1 tbsp chia seeds.

thursday.name: Chicken Stir-fry
thursday.details: 150g chicken breast, broccoli, bell peppers, light soy sauce.

friday.name: Quinoa Salad
friday.details: 1 cup cooked quinoa, mixed vegetables, lemon vinaigrette.

saturday.name: Greek Yogurt with Berries
saturday.details: 1 cup yogurt, 1/2 cup mixed berries, 1 tbsp chia seeds.

saturday.name: Chicken Stir-fry
saturday.details: 150g chicken breast, broccoli, bell peppers, light soy sauce.

sunday.name: Quinoa Salad
sunday.details: 1 cup cooked quinoa, mixed vegetables, lemon vinaigrette.

patients.title: My Patients
patients.description: A list of all patients assigned to you.
patients.noPatients: You have no patients assigned yet.

addPatient.title: Add Existing Patient
addPatient.description: Enter the email address of the patient you want to assign to yourself. If the user exists, they will be converted to a patient role and assigned to you.
addPatient.errorNotFound: No user found with that email address.
addPatient.errorAlreadyAssigned: This patient is already assigned to another nutritionist.
addPatient.errorCannotAddSelf: You cannot assign yourself as your own patient.
addPatient.errorGeneric: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.

patientDetail.weightProgressDesc: Patient's weight trend over the last month.
patientDetail.aiSuggestionsDesc: Generate meal ideas based on this patient's logs and goals.
patientDetail.selectDate: Select a date to view meal logs.
patientDetail.noRecentMeals: No recent meals found to generate suggestions.

settings.title: Settings
settings.description: Manage your account settings and profile information.
settings.profileDesc: This is your public display name and avatar.
settings.resetEmailDesc: Check your inbox to reset your password.
settings.myPatientsDesc: View and manage your assigned patients.
settings.myNutritionistDesc: Your guide on your health journey.
settings.noNutritionist: You are not currently assigned to a nutritionist.
settings.bmiDesc: Your estimated Body Mass Index based on weight and height.
settings.healthConditionsPlaceholder: e.g., Lactose intolerant, nut allergy, Type 2 Diabetes...
settings.personalDataUpdated: Your personal data has been updated.

admin.title: Admin Dashboard
admin.description: Oversee and manage the entire application.
admin.userManagementDesc: View, edit, and manage all users in the system.
admin.allUsersDesc: Approve, deactivate, change roles, or delete users from this panel.
admin.statusUpdatedDesc: User status has been changed to {status}.
admin.roleUpdatedDesc: User role has been changed to {role}.
admin.noUsers: No users found in the system.
admin.profileInfoDesc: Edit the user's main profile and role.
admin.personalDataDesc: View and edit patient-specific health data.

pending.title: Account Pending Approval
pending.description: Your account is currently under review. You will be notified once it has been approved by an administrator.

delete.title: Are you sure you want to delete this user?
delete.description: This will permanently delete user {email} and all their associated data. This action cannot be undone.

activities.title: Activities for {date}
activities.description: You logged {count} activity on this day.
activities.description_plural: You logged {count} activities on this day.
activities.noActivities: No activities logged for this day.
activities.placeholder: Select a day on the calendar to view your logged activities.

delete.title: Delete Activity
delete.description: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete the activity entry for '{activityName}'.

nutritionist.title: My Nutritionist
nutritionist.description: Information about your assigned healthcare professional.
nutritionist.noPastSessions: You haven't had any sessions yet.
nutritionist.noNutritionistDesc: You can add a nutritionist using an invitation code in your settings page.
nutritionist.cannotCancelTooltip: Cannot cancel within 24 hours of appointment

validation.passwordMin: Password must be at least 6 characters

mealLibrary.title: Meal Library
mealLibrary.subtitle: Manage your reusable meals
mealLibrary.noResults: No meals found with the applied filters
mealLibrary.emptyState: You haven't created any meals yet. Create your first meal!

deleteDialog.title: Delete meal?

dialog.createDesc: Add a new meal to your library

deleteDialog.description: Are you sure you want to delete "{name}"? This action cannot be undone.

dialog.descPlaceholder: Describe the goal of this plan...

builder.noMeals: No meals scheduled for this day

noNutritionist.title: No Nutritionist Assigned
noNutritionist.description: To access a personalized meal plan, you need to have a nutritionist assigned. Ask your nutritionist to assign you a plan.

noPlan.title: No Plan Assigned
noPlan.description: Your nutritionist hasn't assigned you a meal plan yet. Contact your nutritionist to create a personalized plan for you.

assignPlan.title: Assign Meal Plan
assignPlan.description: Assign a meal plan to {patientName}. You can use an existing template or create a custom plan.
assignPlan.isActiveDesc: This will be the main plan the patient sees.

appointments.notesPlaceholder: Add any notes for your nutritionist...
